snippet.title: Cabernet - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Here's a fresh look at gameplay from Cabernet in this new trailer for the upcoming 2D narrative RPG set in a 19th century Eastern European inspired world, with a modern twist. Guide Liza, a young vampire in her new unlife among the unsuspecting townsfolk. Will you retain your humanity or descend further into the horror you have become? Cabernet will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox in 2025.
